main event: A round, white and gray object, the size of a basketball, was observed for 4-5 minutes in Rockville Center, New York.
interesting points: The object had a definite outline and was reported by a civilian,The sighting lasted 4-5 minutes,The object was seen hovering to the east,It was characterized by observers as possibly being a balloon or aircraft,There were a total of 9 objects observed.
